Segment.name: LH4
Segment.comment: To specify additional Transport Canada requirements covering transportation of dangerous goods in Canada

Field.name: EmergencyResponsePlanNumber
Field.comment: The identity number of a specific hazardous emergency response plan that is assigned by the Director General of Canada

Field.name: CommunicationNumber1
Field.comment: Complete communications number including country or area code when applicable

Field.name: PackingGroupCode
Field.comment: Code indicating degree of danger in terms of Roman number I, II or III

Field.name: SubsidiaryClassification1
Field.comment: Code indicating the classification of dangerous goods, other than the primary classification, that is associated with a number or a set of numbers

Field.name: SubsidiaryClassification2
Field.comment: Code indicating the classification of dangerous goods, other than the primary classification, that is associated with a number or a set of numbers

Field.name: SubsidiaryClassification3
Field.comment: Code indicating the classification of dangerous goods, other than the primary classification, that is associated with a number or a set of numbers

Field.name: SubsidiaryRiskIndicator
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of subsidiary risk

Field.name: NetExplosiveQuantity
Field.comment: Net weight of the explosive quantity of the hazardous commodity

Field.name: CanadianHazardousNotation
Field.comment: Notation required by Canadian regulatory agencies

Field.name: SpecialCommodityIndicatorCode
Field.comment: Code indicating 'Special Commodity' notation on operational waybill as identified by the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Act and Regulation (TDG)

Field.name: CommunicationNumber2
Field.comment: Complete communications number including country or area code when applicable

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

SyntaxNote.name: P0102
SyntaxNote.comment: If either LH401 or LH402 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0812
SyntaxNote.comment: If either LH408 or LH412 is present, then the other is required.
